title: Kelly Cochran ////// 228
description:
Kelly Cochran ////// 228

Part 1 of 1

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

Where was Chris Regan? That is what started this whole messed up situation. Jealousy and revenge murders are pretty common but Kelly Cochran is as cold as they come. She set up her lover to be killed. Then she killed her husband for revenge. This is the story of a love triangle with only one side remaining. Tonight we introduce you to a manipulative and heartless woman. Beer of the Week - Mind Games by Answer Brew PubGarage Grade - 4 out of 5 bottle caps
